website_images.alt_text: Sentimark's AI sentiment analysis dashboard showing financial market trends with data visualization
website_images.dalle_prompt: A professional, modern financial dashboard interface showing sentiment analysis of market data. Blue and purple color scheme with sleek data visualizations including sentiment charts, trend graphs, and stock ticker information. Multiple widgets showing positive and negative sentiment scores. Clean, corporate aesthetic with subtle AI elements.

website_images.alt_text: AI analysis icon representing intelligent data processing
website_images.dalle_prompt: A minimalist flat design icon representing AI analysis. A stylized brain with circuit patterns in blue gradient on a transparent background. Clean, modern, professional look suitable for a financial technology website.

website_images.alt_text: Hidden alpha detection icon showing market insight discovery
website_images.dalle_prompt: A minimalist flat design icon representing hidden financial insights (alpha). A stylized magnifying glass revealing an upward trending chart, in blue and purple gradient on a transparent background. Professional, clean design for a financial technology company.

website_images.alt_text: Real-time alerts icon showing notification and instant updates
website_images.dalle_prompt: A minimalist flat design icon representing real-time financial alerts. A stylized bell or notification symbol with subtle dynamic elements suggesting immediacy, in blue and teal gradient on a transparent background. Clean, professional look for a financial technology platform.

website_images.alt_text: Mobile-first design icon showing smartphone with responsive interface
website_images.dalle_prompt: A minimalist flat design icon representing mobile-first design. A stylized smartphone displaying a simple app interface with financial charts, in blue gradient on a transparent background. Clean, modern style suitable for a fintech company.

website_images.alt_text: Data collection process showing multiple sources feeding into a central system
website_images.dalle_prompt: A modern flat design illustration showing financial data collection process. Multiple sources (news articles, social media feeds, market tickers) flowing into a central processing hub. Blue and purple color scheme, professional corporate style with clean lines and minimal shadows. Suitable for a financial technology company.

website_images.alt_text: AI processing illustration showing neural networks analyzing financial data
website_images.dalle_prompt: A modern flat design illustration showing AI processing of financial data. Neural network visualization with nodes and connections overlaid on financial charts and text data. Blue and purple color scheme with subtle digital elements. Clean, professional style suitable for a fintech AI company.

website_images.alt_text: Alpha discovery illustration showing hidden patterns and insights in financial data
website_images.dalle_prompt: A modern flat design illustration showing financial hidden alpha discovery. Charts with highlighted pattern recognition, sentiment indicators, and trend identification. Visualization of algorithms finding meaningful signals in noise. Blue and purple color scheme, clean professional style with subtle lighting effects suitable for a financial AI company.

website_images.alt_text: Actionable insights illustration showing data-driven decision making process
website_images.dalle_prompt: A modern flat design illustration showing actionable financial insights derived from data. A mobile device displaying clear market recommendations, buy/sell signals, and sentiment scores. Professional looking charts with decision points highlighted. Blue and purple color scheme, clean corporate style suitable for a financial technology company.

website_images.alt_text: Sentimark's diverse team of financial and AI experts collaborating in a modern office
website_images.dalle_prompt: A professional corporate team of diverse financial technology experts in a modern office environment. 5-6 people in business casual attire collaborating around screens showing financial data and charts. Blue accent lighting, clean modern workspace with glass and minimalist furniture. Natural, professional poses, not looking directly at camera.

website_images.alt_text: Sentimark Kickstarter campaign preview showing project goals and reward tiers
website_images.dalle_prompt: A professional Kickstarter campaign preview for a financial technology product. Modern layout showing product mockups of a sentiment analysis app on mobile and desktop. Includes stylized reward tiers and funding goal visualization. Blue and purple brand colors with Kickstarter green accents. Clean, corporate style suitable for a serious financial technology startup.

A minimal, clean SVG favicon for Sentimark financial technology company. Simple 'S' letterform with a subtle chart line or upward trend integrated into the design. Primary blue color (#2E5BFF). Professional, modern style with good visibility at small sizes.

A professional vector logo for Sentimark financial technology company. Clean, modern wordmark with integrated sentiment graph element. Primary blue color (#2E5BFF). Horizontal format with good visibility at various sizes.

A professional white vector logo for Sentimark financial technology company. Clean, modern wordmark with integrated sentiment graph element. Pure white color on transparent background. Horizontal format with good visibility for use on dark backgrounds.

style_notes: All images should have a clean, modern, professional look
Avoid cluttered designs and maintain ample white space
Use subtle shadows and depth rather than flat design where appropriate
Illustrations should be consistent in style across the site
Icons should be simple enough to be recognizable at small sizes
Color gradients should transition smoothly between brand colors
Images should reflect the financial technology industry and sentiment analysis focus

responsive_guidelines.icons: Single optimized size at 2x the display dimensions
